::Dark Prime::

    He had deviled deep into his powers, that of Time. (I'm=
 surprised that you chose the Matrix thing instead of the whole trying to b=
e Master if Time thing) He knew the limits of his capabilities, and so far =
he had only enough power to bring back one bot. Only one, so he had to thin=
k carefully. Megatron is too insane, as are most of the Deceptions. That le=
ft the Autobots. He choose his second in command, Ironhide.
    He focused =
his power and opened a channel to the future. He then pulled the Ironhide f=
rom his retirement, as to not disrupt time too much.
    "Ironhide, you wil=
l join me in my quest," He said as he closed the gateway. He focused some o=
f his dark power into Ironhide. "Arise, Dark Ironhide."
    Ironhide got up=
, he went into stasis. He needed to have a Beast Mode. Dark Prime chose for=
 him a elephant mode.
    "Thank you Prime," Ironhide said. "Get ready for =
the new Ironhide!!"
(I give Ironhide over to Kinger01030@...)
